short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hold down your mouse click on a TikTok video on the browser to increase it's speed by 2.0x.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Similar to the game-changing update on the mobile app which allows you to hold the sides of a TikTok video to speed it up, this chrome extension does the same thing.

When your mouse is over the TikTok you are watching, holding down your mouse button will now speed up the video by 2x speed, and an indicator will show up at the bottom of the video. 

Have fun scrolling!
